comment.author: Laura
comment.text: Kaine would be smart to walk out now before he ruins his chances for a future in politics because of the scandals of the Obama's and the Clinton's... Clinton's belong behind bars lock them up and throw away the keys... Obama will pardon her no doubt he probably knows about everything too but going to cover his butt for his so call legacy ... No one should be above the law !!! WATCH fox news FOR THE truth !!! VOTE TRUMP/PENCE !!!

replies.author: Laura
replies.text: You haven't heard the real news since last night watch FOX NEWS for the TRUTH... She is the worse thing that has ever happened to America and should not get away with what she has done....
